DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness smartphone application management type 2 diabetes mellitus ( DM ) . Type 2 DM almost incurable chronic disease continuous management important long-term prognosis . Thus , investigator develop smartphone application give program medical intervention patient accord patient data ; blood pressure , fast blood sugar , body weight , calorie intake , exercise amount , etc .
